entities.name: disarmed
entities.description: The event of being disarmed is mentioned as a past action of Voldemort's wand. ("Does the wand in your hand know its last master was Disarmed?")

entities.name: elder wand
entities.description: The Elder Wand is mentioned as an object that has a history of being mastered by previous owners. ("Because if it does . . . I am the true master of the Elder Wand.")

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as a person who has been disarmed in the past. ("Does the wand in your hand know its last master was Disarmed?")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who is trying to cast a spell against Voldemort. ("The light hit both of their faces at the same time, so that Voldemort’s was suddenly a ﬂaming blur.")

entities.name: draco
entities.description: Draco is mentioned as the owner of a wand. ("Harry heard the high voice shriek as he too yelled his best hope to the heavens, pointing Draco’s wand:")

entities.name: avada kedavra
entities.description: Avada Kedavra is mentioned as a spell cast by Harry. ("Harry heard the high voice shriek as he too yelled his best hope to the heavens, pointing Draco’s wand:")

entities.name: expelliarmus
entities.description: Expelliarmus is mentioned as a spell cast by Harry. ("Harry heard the high voice shriek as he too yelled his best hope to the heavens, pointing Draco’s wand:")

relationships.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the previous master of the Elder Wand. ("Because if it does . . . I am the true master of the Elder Wand.")
Harry is mentioned as casting the Avada Kedavra spell. ("Harry heard the high voice shriek as he too yelled his best hope to the heavens, pointing Draco’s wand:")
Harry is mentioned as casting the Expelliarmus spell. ("Harry heard the high voice shriek as he too yelled his best hope to the heavens, pointing Draco’s wand:")
Voldemort is mentioned as being targeted by Harry's Avada Kedavra spell. ("The light hit both of their faces at the same time, so that Voldemort’s was suddenly a ﬂaming blur.")
